targets.rawSql:
SELECT T1.EndDate as StartDate, TP1.address as Adresse, TP1.ideal_battery_range_km as StartRange, 
T2.StartDate as EndDate, T2.StartPos as EndPos, TP2.ideal_battery_range_km as EndRange,
TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - TP2.ideal_battery_range_km as RangeDiff,
timestampdiff(MINUTE, T1.EndDate, T2.StartDate) as TimeDiffMinutes,
(select RangeDiff / TimeDiffMinutes backup.sh home.pogea.de 60) as RangeLostPerHour
FROM drivestate as T1 
left outer join drivestate as T2 on T1.id + 1 = T2.id 
left outer Join pos as TP1 on T1.EndPos = TP1.id 
left outer join pos as TP2 on T2.StartPos = TP2.id
where $__timeFilter(T1.EndDate) and TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - TP2.ideal_battery_range_km >= 0 and timestampdiff(MINUTE, T1.EndDate, T2.StartDate) > 60
